verses.verse: And it came to pass after many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came to Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> in the third <S%H7992><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, shew <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8734><s%> thyself unto Ach'av <S%H256><s%>; and I will send <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> the earth <S%H127><s%>.

And Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to shew <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8736><s%> himself unto Ach'av <S%H256><s%>. And there was a sore <S%H2389><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%> in SHomron <S%H8111><s%>.

And Ach'av <S%H256><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> `Ovadyah-yahu <S%H5662><s%>, which was the governor of his house <S%H1004><s%>. (Now `Ovadyah-yahu <S%H5662><s%> feared <S%H3373><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>:

For it was so, when Jezebel <S%H348><s%> cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that `Ovadyah-yahu <S%H5662><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%>, and hid <S%H2244><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them by fifty <S%H376><s%> <S%H2572><s%> in a cave <S%H4631><s%>, and fed <S%H3557><s%> <S%H8773><s%> them with bread <S%H3899><s%> and water <S%H4325><s%>.)

And Ach'av <S%H256><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto `Ovadyah-yahu <S%H5662><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%>, unto all fountains <S%H4599><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, and unto all brooks <S%H5158><s%>: peradventure <S%H194><s%> we may find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> grass <S%H2682><s%> to save <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the horses <S%H5483><s%> and mules <S%H6505><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, that we lose <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8686><s%> not all the beasts <S%H929><s%>.

So they divided <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> between them to pass throughout <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it: Ach'av <S%H256><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> one <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> by himself, and `Ovadyah-yahu <S%H5662><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> another <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> by himself.

And as `Ovadyah-yahu <S%H5662><s%> was in the way <S%H1870><s%>, behold, Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> met <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him: and he knew <S%H5234><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him, and fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Art thou that my lord <S%H113><s%> Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> ?
And he answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, I am: go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy lord <S%H113><s%>, Behold, Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> is here.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What have I sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that thou wouldest deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ach'av <S%H256><s%>, to slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8687><s%> me?

As the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, there is no <S%H3426><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> or kingdom <S%H4467><s%>, whither <S%H834><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> hath not sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8763><s%> thee: and when they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, He is not there; he took an oath <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8689><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> and nation <S%H1471><s%>, that they found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee not.
And now thou sayest <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy lord <S%H113><s%>, Behold, Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> is here.

And it shall come to pass, as soon as I am gone <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from thee, that the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall carry <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee whither I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not; and so when I come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and tell <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8687><s%> Ach'av <S%H256><s%>, and he cannot find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee, he shall slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me: but I thy servant <S%H5650><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> from my youth <S%H5271><s%>.

Was it not told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8717><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> what I did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> when Jezebel <S%H348><s%> slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, how I hid <S%H2244><s%> <S%H8686><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> by fifty <S%H2572><s%> in a cave <S%H4631><s%>, and fed <S%H3557><s%> <S%H8770><s%> them with bread <S%H3899><s%> and water <S%H4325><s%> ?

And now thou sayest <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy lord <S%H113><s%>, Behold, Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> is here: and he shall slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me.

And Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, As the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> whom I stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I will surely shew <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> myself unto him to day <S%H3117><s%>.

So `Ovadyah-yahu <S%H5662><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Ach'av <S%H256><s%>, and told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him: and Ach'av <S%H256><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%>.

And it came to pass, when Ach'av <S%H256><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%>, that Ach'av <S%H256><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Art thou he that troubleth <S%H5916><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> ?

And he answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I have not troubled <S%H5916><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; but thou, and thy father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, in that ye have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and thou hast followed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H310><s%> Baalim <S%H1168><s%>.

Now therefore send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to me all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Karmel <S%H3760><s%>, and the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>, and the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of the groves <S%H842><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, which eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> at Jezebel's <S%H348><s%> table <S%H7979><s%>.

So Ach'av <S%H256><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and gathered <S%H6908><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> together <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Karmel <S%H3760><s%>.

And Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> came <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, How long <S%H5921><s%> halt <S%H6452><s%> <S%H8802><s%> ye between two <S%H8147><s%> opinions <S%H5587><s%>? if the YY <S%H3068><s%> be 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, follow him: but if Baal <S%H1168><s%>, then follow <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> <S%H310><s%> him. And the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him not a word <S%H1697><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, I, even I only, remain <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8738><s%> a prophet <S%H5030><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>; but Baal's <S%H1168><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> are four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> men <S%H376><s%>.

Let them therefore give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> us two <S%H8147><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%>; and let them choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> one <S%H259><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> for themselves, and cut it in pieces <S%H5408><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and lay <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it on wood <S%H6086><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no fire <S%H784><s%> under: and I will dress <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the other <S%H259><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%>, and lay <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it on wood <S%H6086><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no fire <S%H784><s%> under:

And call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ye on the name <S%H8034><s%> of your 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, and I will call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>: and the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> that answereth <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by fire <S%H784><s%>, let him be 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, It is well <S%H2896><s%> spoken <S%H1697><s%>.

And Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%>, Choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8798><s%> you one <S%H259><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> for yourselves, and dress <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> it first <S%H7223><s%>; for ye are many <S%H7227><s%>; and call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of your 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, but put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no fire <S%H784><s%> under.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> which was given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, and they dressed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%> from morning <S%H1242><s%> even until noon <S%H6672><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, O Baal <S%H1168><s%>, hear <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8798><s%> us. But there was no <S%H369><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>, nor any that answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8802><s%>. And they leaped <S%H6452><s%> <S%H8762><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> which was made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And it came to pass at noon <S%H6672><s%>, that Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> mocked <S%H2048><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Cry <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> aloud <S%H1419><s%> <S%H6963><s%>: for he is a god <S%H430><s%>; either he is talking <S%H7879><s%>, or he is pursuing <S%H7873><s%>, or he is in a journey <S%H1870><s%>, or peradventure <S%H194><s%> he sleepeth <S%H3463><s%>, and must be awaked <S%H3364><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And they cried <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> aloud <S%H6963><s%> <S%H1419><s%>, and cut <S%H1413><s%> <S%H8704><s%> themselves after their manner <S%H4941><s%> with knives <S%H2719><s%> and lancets <S%H7420><s%>, till the blood <S%H1818><s%> gushed out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8800><s%> upon them.

And it came to pass, when midday <S%H6672><s%> was past <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and they prophesied <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8691><s%> until the time of the offering <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the evening sacrifice <S%H4503><s%>, that there was neither voice <S%H6963><s%>, nor any to answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, nor any that regarded <S%H7182><s%>.

And Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%>, Come near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto me. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> came near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him. And he repaired <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> that was broken down <S%H2040><s%> <S%H8803><s%>.

And Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, unto whom the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall be thy name <S%H8034><s%>:

And with the stones <S%H68><s%> he built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>: and he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a trench <S%H8585><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>, as great as would contain <S%H1004><s%> two measures <S%H5429><s%> of seed <S%H2233><s%>.

And he put <S%H6186><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> in order <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and cut <S%H5408><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> in pieces, and laid <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him on the wood <S%H6086><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Fill <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8798><s%> four <S%H702><s%> barrels <S%H3537><s%> with water <S%H4325><s%>, and pour <S%H3332><s%> <S%H8798><s%> it on the burnt sacrifice <S%H5930><s%>, and on the wood <S%H6086><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Do it the second time <S%H8138><s%> <S%H8798><s%>. And they did it the second time <S%H8138><s%> <S%H8799><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Do it the third time <S%H8027><s%> <S%H8761><s%>. And they did it the third time <S%H8027><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

And the water <S%H4325><s%> ran <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>; and he filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the trench <S%H8585><s%> also with water <S%H4325><s%>.

And it came to pass at the time of the offering <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the evening sacrifice <S%H4503><s%>, that Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> came near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Avraham <S%H85><s%>, Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>, and of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, let it be known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8735><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> that thou art 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and that I am thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, and that I have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all these things at thy word <S%H1697><s%>.

Hear <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, hear <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me, that this people <S%H5971><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that thou art the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and that thou hast turned <S%H5437><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> back <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8689><s%> again <S%H322><s%>.

Then the fire <S%H784><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and consumed <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the burnt sacrifice <S%H5930><s%>, and the wood <S%H6086><s%>, and the stones <S%H68><s%>, and the dust <S%H6083><s%>, and licked up <S%H3897><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> that was in the trench <S%H8585><s%>.

And when all the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, they fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on their faces <S%H6440><s%>: and they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, The YY <S%H3068><s%>, he is the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; the YY <S%H3068><s%>, he is the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

And Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Take <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%>; let not one <S%H376><s%> of them escape <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8735><s%>. And they took <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them: and Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> brought them down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> Kishon <S%H7028><s%>, and slew <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them there.

And Eliyahyahu <S%H452><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Ach'av <S%H256><s%>, Get thee up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; for there is a sound <S%H6963><s%> of abundance <S%H1995><s%> of rain <S%H1653><s%>.

So Ach'av <S%H256><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> and to drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.
